.. title:: mmspy documentation

.. module:: mmspy

#############################
mmspy |release| documentation
#############################

mmspy is a Python package for querying and analyzing data from the
NASA Magnetospheric Multiscale (MMS) mission, powered by
`Xarray <https://xarray.dev/>`_.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :hidden:

   API Reference <api>
